Stressors That Cannot Be Verified
Some stressors are clearly impossible to verify and should not be referred to MRRC.Â  The following are examples of types of stressors that should not be referred to MRRC:
events that almost happened, and
mistreatment of enemy prisoners
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section A - General Information and Development for Posttraumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) Claims
